title: Connection
description:
Jean Le Bec, Danny Artese, and Sarah Long Hendershot share stories about a nudist colony, a bully teacher, and an unlikely friendship with a grumpy old man.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Jazz at Lincoln Center Orchestra with Wynton Marsalis, Jean Le Bec, Blur, Danny Artese, Jack Johnson, Kevin Allison, Sarah Long Hendershot, Jeff Barr, The Jane Mutiny)
